page.title: 19Linear Park
page.content: The linear park is an environmental feature which stretches the length of Rainford in a north-south direction from Rainford Junction to Rookery Drive.It follows the line of the old railway which used to run from St.Helens to Rainford but which was closed in the early sixties. It was left untended for many years after the lines were lifted but about five years ago a plan was put forward to change this derelict land into a public amenity.The route was levelled off, it was grassed and shrubs and bushes were planted. A number of play areas were also included in this scheme. Now that it is completed this landscaped feature provides a pleasant walk of about two miles to the residents of Rainford.
